ygData.subject: RE: Sonorous clouding
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually had a humerous experience in Sol A last night regarding spell casters buffing others.  If you don t know Sol A, don t worry, my description is
ygData.messageBody:
I actually had a humerous experience in Sol A last night regarding spell
casters buffing others. If you don't know Sol A, don't worry, my
description is unimportant. What is important is that I was pulling from
the bar room area to the safe room where we were camped. There was an
annoying Young goblin wizard that spawned near the door I was pulling from.
Rather then pull it, I just lamented it and ignored it for the next 6 or 7
pulls (it conned very green to my party). Since I didn't have bellow memmed
or throwing dagger with me, I have to run up and hit the MOB to get it
agro'ed. Everytime I ran the MOB by the young wizard, it would cast a
damage shield on the MOB and we would spend the rest of the fight getting
"you are burned" messages :P. I finally got sick of it and just killed the
sob, but I found it very humerous that it was perfectly timing its spells on
every pull to make sure my mob got a little bit of extra help against us.


Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 30th song
Prexus

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 2:08 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Sonorous clouding
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> The first time I walked all the way from the zone to 4C in Cazic I wasn't
> attacked. I conned everything along the way and everything was
> indifferent.
> Next time I walked thru I assumed I was safe and didn't con any
> lizards as I
> moved. I walked by a lizard in the maze and got attacked. The best
> explanation I have to why it saw thru the invis was that the
> lizard had the
> see invis spell buff. I don't know if lizard spellcasters can
> actually cast
> this spell but if they can that would easily explain it. If they
> can't cast
> see invis then I have no idea what happened.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
>
> > I have a theory about Sonorous Coulding failing. It has failed for me a
> > few times (although I have NEVER been attacked my any lizard in CT :). I
> > noticed (and posted) my success in Unrest a few days ago. My only
> > failure was when a mob spawned right near me and immediately attacked.
> > Then today I read a post from someone who was in CT and looking at the
> > spawns in the Throne Room, they stated that 2 mobs walked in OR spawned
> > and saw thru their invis.
> >
> > I know certain mobs can see invis, and that invis can fail, but neither
> > I nor the poster got "you feel yourself starting to appear".
> >
> > It appears that sonorous clouding works on mobs that are in the zone
> > when it pulses, but mobs who spawn and have not had a "dose" (pulse) of
> > it can see thru it. Just ancedotal evidence so far, if anyone can add to
> > this, please do so.
> >
> >
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
